definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
bushidō or way of the warrior, samurai code of chivalry
Wu Shihuo (7th century), father of Tang empress Wu Zetian 武則天|武则天

sentences.english: The torsos are hollow, with solid arms and legs.
sentences.chinese: 這些武士的軀幹是空心的，而四肢是實心的。

sentences.english: Lightsabers have changed little in the thousands of years of their employ by the Jedi Knights.
sentences.chinese: 在絕地武士使用光劍的幾千年裏，光劍的變化不大。

sentences.english: Even the nails on the suits and the hair and beards of the soldiers are carefully detailed.
sentences.chinese: 那鎧甲上最小甲釘甚至武士俑的頭髮鬍子都絲絲可見。

sentences.english: By the end of his shows, only a few iron beasts still move.
sentences.chinese: 每次表演結束，還能自己動彈的鐵武士就寥寥可數了。

sentences.english: He examined the old knight and shook his head sadly.
sentences.chinese: 診察了這位老武士之後，傷心地搖搖頭。

sentences.english: With that, the white knight rode off like a whirlwind.
sentences.chinese: 白武士說完，就策馬飛馳而去。

sentences.english: The hundred knights were all men of choice behaviour and sobriety of manners .
sentences.chinese: 那一百名武士都是品行端正，絕不胡作非爲的。

sentences.english: The Knave did so, very carefully, with one foot.
sentences.chinese: 武士用腳小心地把他們三個翻了過來。

sentences.english: The stories of the Knights of the Round Table make up the Arthurian cycle.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王傳奇是由一些圓桌武士的故事構成。

sentences.english: The beauty of cherry flowers and military arts give rise to the aesthetics view of Japanese people.
sentences.chinese: 櫻花的美，武士道等導致了日本人死的美學觀。

sentences.english: The target paladin loses his Divine Grace bonuses for one round.
sentences.chinese: 目標聖武士將在這一輪內失去他的神恩獎勵。

sentences.english: Warriors such as the Samurai have traditionally used masks to intimidate their enemies.
sentences.chinese: 傳統上，日本的武士用面具來威嚇他們的仇敵。

sentences.english: The beleaguered Jedi Knights fought valiantly to repulse the Mandalorian marauders.
sentences.chinese: 被圍攻的絕地武士英勇戰鬥，擊退了曼達洛強盜。

sentences.english: The reason the Ninja doesn't show up is because the scene's ambient light has been set to total darkness.
sentences.chinese: 武士不能顯示是因爲場景環境光被設爲了全黑。

sentences.english: One day an  infamous young warrior arrived at the village.
sentences.chinese: 一天一個臭名昭著的年輕武士來到了這個村莊。

sentences.english: Learn how to fold an origami samurai hat.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何折一折紙武士帽。

definition: counselor of king or feudal warlord/henchman
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
person willing to sacrifice his life (for a good cause)
defense of the imperial palace or of the capital/the palace guard (or a member of that unit)
berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
